text:
Curious to know what everyone's go-to stack is for HS development. I was running Gulp tasks for a time but found it was buggy and unreliable, so I migrated to Webpack and have had much better luck. Biggest issue now is how long it takes to pack my sites and deploy the `dist` but otherwise I'm pleased. Working with:

• TailwindCSS + PostCSS for proper nesting
• TypeScript for my `main` and dependencies like jQuery, JS carousel, Lodash, Select2, etc.
• Minify plugins and general linting via ESLint
Trying to keep it light, but I'm wondering what others are doing to improve their HS development process.
Also curious what kind of CI/CD people work with. I'm introducing some GitHub Actions for better versioning and more predictable deployments to my dev/staging/prod envs.
I have yet to dip my toes into the API in any meaningful way. Don't see the use just yet for my clients, though I know there's a ton of value.
